desc: A range of sustainable items for around the home and gifts to start or grow plastic free & zero waste efforts. Gift hampers and products. We are a small family run business based on Teesside in the North East of England with a love for nature and want to protect what we enjoy. A Boro boy connections with nature author.

layout.text: Zero waste online store - products & sustainable gifts
Plastic free, including those made in the North of England & Scotland. Donation to conservation with each product sold.
